rationale: Perfect convergence. All agents independently arrived at the identical architecture: Qwen2.5-VL-72B (Q4_K_M), window-aware cropping, delta hashing, and structured JSON output. Agent A's solution is the standout deliverable because it provides the most comprehensive implementation details, including critical NixOS configuration snippets and robust pseudocode that correctly handles edge cases like maximized window splitting and Z-order occlusion.
